hints.label: thm-viscous-momentum-conservation
hints.title: Exact Momentum Conservation
hints.content:
48: :label: thm-viscous-momentum-conservation
49: 
50: The viscous coupling force **exactly conserves total momentum**:
51: 
52: $$
53: \sum_{i=1}^N \mathbf{F}_{\text{viscous}}(x_i, S) = 0
54: $$
55: 
56: **Proof**:
57: 
58: $$
59: \sum_{i=1}^N \mathbf{F}_{\text{viscous}}(x_i) = \nu \sum_{i=1}^N \sum_{j \neq i} K(x_i - x_j)(v_j - v_i)
60: $$
61: 
62: By symmetry of the kernel $K(x_i - x_j) = K(x_j - x_i)$, each pair $(i, j)$ contributes:
63: 
64: $$
65: K(x_i - x_j)(v_j - v_i) + K(x_j - x_i)(v_i - v_j) = K(x_i - x_j)[(v_j - v_i) - (v_j - v_i)] = 0
66: $$
67:
hints.raw_directive:
45: ## 2. Conservation Properties
46: 
47: :::{prf:theorem} Exact Momentum Conservation
48: :label: thm-viscous-momentum-conservation
49: 
50: The viscous coupling force **exactly conserves total momentum**:
51: 
52: $$
53: \sum_{i=1}^N \mathbf{F}_{\text{viscous}}(x_i, S) = 0
54: $$
55: 
56: **Proof**:
57: 
58: $$
59: \sum_{i=1}^N \mathbf{F}_{\text{viscous}}(x_i) = \nu \sum_{i=1}^N \sum_{j \neq i} K(x_i - x_j)(v_j - v_i)
60: $$
61: 
62: By symmetry of the kernel $K(x_i - x_j) = K(x_j - x_i)$, each pair $(i, j)$ contributes:
63: 
64: $$
65: K(x_i - x_j)(v_j - v_i) + K(x_j - x_i)(v_i - v_j) = K(x_i - x_j)[(v_j - v_i) - (v_j - v_i)] = 0
66: $$
67: 
68: Therefore, the total momentum is conserved. ∎

hints.label: prop-viscous-energy-dissipation
hints.title: Energy Dissipation
hints.content:
73: :label: prop-viscous-energy-dissipation
74: 
75: The viscous force **dissipates kinetic energy**:
76: 
77: $$
78: \frac{d E_{\text{kin}}}{dt}\bigg|_{\text{viscous}} = -\frac{\nu m}{2} \sum_{i, j} K(x_i - x_j) \|v_i - v_j\|^2 \leq 0
79: $$
80: 
81: **Proof**:
82: 
83: The rate of kinetic energy change is:
84: 
85: $$
86: \frac{d E_{\text{kin}}}{dt} = \sum_{i=1}^N m v_i \cdot \frac{dv_i}{dt} = m\nu \sum_i v_i \cdot \sum_j K(x_i - x_j)(v_j - v_i)
87: $$
88: 
89: $$
90: = m\nu \sum_{i,j} K(x_i - x_j) v_i \cdot (v_j - v_i)
91: $$
92: 
93: Expanding and using symmetry:
94: 
95: $$
96: = \frac{m\nu}{2} \sum_{i,j} K(x_i - x_j) [v_i \cdot (v_j - v_i) + v_j \cdot (v_i - v_j)]
97: $$
98: 
99: $$
100: = \frac{m\nu}{2} \sum_{i,j} K(x_i - x_j) [v_i \cdot v_j - \|v_i\|^2 + v_j \cdot v_i - \|v_j\|^2]
101: $$
102: 
103: $$
104: = -\frac{m\nu}{2} \sum_{i,j} K(x_i - x_j) [\|v_i\|^2 + \|v_j\|^2 - 2v_i \cdot v_j]
105: $$
106: 
107: $$
108: = -\frac{m\nu}{2} \sum_{i,j} K(x_i - x_j) \|v_i - v_j\|^2 \leq 0
109: $$
110:
